thread.section_title: Hotel Panache - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Large Room for Paris
thread.title_full: Large Room for Paris - Review of Hotel Panache, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AbigailMaryLouise
title: Large Room for Paris
text:
We stayed at the hotel for a long weekend for my Mother's birthday and had a lovely weekend.
We booked a suite but ended up changing to a lovely double and just shared the large bed. This was primarily due to the lack of light in the suite and we wanted the light flooded room (hopefully with a balcony!) I had seen on the website and social media.
The room was large by Paris standards - really beautifully decorated and a great ensuite bathroom with a powerful shower and lovely toiletries.
The receptionist on the Friday looked after us really well - booking us in and changing our rooms with no fuss. Check out was easy and accommodating with our baggage.
The rooms are quite warm and we had to sleep with the window open but that was OK.
The position of the hotel is good although the immediate surrounding area isn't what I expected - being quite commercial but I should have checked that out.
The restaurant next door is excellent - offering a great selection of food and wines. It is a shame that you are unable to put items to your room and that you have to albeit very briefly go outside to walk between the restaurant and reception to use the bathroom.
Overall very good for the price.
